The operation seized assault rifles, pistols, ammunition, drug money, and a vehicle. Disguised as skill game arcades, the businesses reportedly grossed over $9.5 million between 2022 and 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/nine-from-gujarat-indicted-in-us-for-illegal-gambling-operation/articleshow/122939829.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/nine-from-gujarat-indicted-in-us-for-illegal-gambling-operation/articleshow/122939829.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:31:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ASHISH CHAUHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1370781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940796,imgsize-1370781.cms"/></item><item><title>Indian team breaks multiple records — most centuries, 350+ totals and more</title><description><![CDATA[India's batting prowess shone brightly in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, securing a draw in the fourth Test at Old Trafford and rewriting record books. Washington Sundar's century contributed to India equaling their record of 11 centuries in a series, matching their 1978-79 feat against West Indies. The team also set a new record with seven 350-plus totals, surpassing Australia's previous best.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-indian-team-breaks-multiple-records-most-individual-centuries-350-totals-and-more/articleshow/122943055.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-indian-team-breaks-multiple-records-most-individual-centuries-350-totals-and-more/articleshow/122943055.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 07:30:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="133332" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122943058,imgsize-133332.cms"/></item><item><title>'Settled India-Pak, now it's Thailand-Cambodia'; Trump credits trade pressure, calls it 'honour'</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump claimed on Sunday that he intervened to settle the India-Pakistan ceasefire, reiterating a past assertion while discussing conflict between Thailand and Cambodia. He stated he warned the prime ministers of Thailand and Cambodia that trade deals hinged on ceasing hostilities. Trump suggested his intervention prevented a potential conflict between India and Pakistan.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-settled-india-pakistan-now-its-thailand-cambodia-says-trump-credits-trade-pressure-calls-it-his-honour/articleshow/122940031.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-settled-india-pakistan-now-its-thailand-cambodia-says-trump-credits-trade-pressure-calls-it-his-honour/articleshow/122940031.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:55:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="6094" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940014,imgsize-6094.cms"/></item><item><title>Google DeepMind CEO on Meta AI hiring: ‘There's more important things than just money, one has to…’</title><description><![CDATA[Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis commented on Meta's AI hiring spree, suggesting it's a strategic move to catch up in the field. Hassabis emphasized that many AI professionals prioritize the responsible development of the technology over financial gains. He also recalled the early days of AI research when funding was scarce.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-deepmind-ceo-demis-hassabis-on-meta-ai-hiring-theres-more-important-things-than-just-money-one-has-to/articleshow/122906604.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/google-deepmind-ceo-demis-hassabis-on-meta-ai-hiring-theres-more-important-things-than-just-money-one-has-to/articleshow/122906604.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 25 Jul 2025 18:20:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29044" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122906598,imgsize-29044.cms"/></item><item><title>Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for week starting July 28, 2025 - check list</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services recommends VA Tech WABAG, a water treatment leader with a strong order book and growth potential, driven by increasing water demand and strategic initiatives. HDFC Bank is also favored, expected to see earnings rebound through loan growth and margin recovery, supported by robust asset quality and provisioning buffers, projecting strong RoA/RoE.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-july-28-2025-week-va-tech-wabag-hdfc-bank-stocks-to-buy-today/articleshow/122939263.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-july-28-2025-week-va-tech-wabag-hdfc-bank-stocks-to-buy-today/articleshow/122939263.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 07:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="90922" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122939266,imgsize-90922.cms"/></item><item><title>'A Test 100 is a Test 100': Gill defends Jadeja-Sundar's refusal to accept early draw</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill defended Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar's pursuit of centuries on Day 5 of the drawn fourth Test against England. Gill emphasised that both deserved their hundreds after their impressive partnership rescued India from a precarious position. Despite England's frustration and Ben Stokes's sarcastic remarks, Jadeja and Sundar remained composed, guiding India to a respectable draw.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-4th-test-a-test-hundred-is-a-test-hundred-shubman-gill-defends-jadeja-washingtons-refusal-to-shake-hands-early/articleshow/122942903.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-4th-test-a-test-hundred-is-a-test-hundred-shubman-gill-defends-jadeja-washingtons-refusal-to-shake-hands-early/articleshow/122942903.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 07:04:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="149212" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122942908,imgsize-149212.cms"/></item><item><title>Two devotees electrocuted outside Awshaneshwar temple in Barabanki</title><description><![CDATA[In Barabanki district, a tragic incident occurred outside the Awshaneshwar Mahadev temple, resulting in the electrocution of two devotees and injuries to several others. The incident happened when they came into contact with an electrified iron pipe and tin shed erected for monsoon shelter. Authorities are investigating the cause, suspecting faulty wiring or leakage.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/devotees-electrocuted-outside-awshaneshwar-temple-in-barabanki-several-injured-police-inquiry/articleshow/122941750.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/devotees-electrocuted-outside-awshaneshwar-temple-in-barabanki-several-injured-police-inquiry/articleshow/122941750.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 05:08:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PATHIKRIT CHAKRABORTY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1055354" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941764,imgsize-1055354.cms"/></item><item><title>‘I think that’s very screwed up’: OpenAI CEO warns about ChatGPT privacy</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has cautioned against over-reliance on ChatGPT, particularly by young individuals using it for personal advice. Altman highlighted that conversations with the AI chatbot lack legal protection, potentially making them admissible in court. He expressed concern about users sharing sensitive information and the need for privacy safeguards akin to those in therapist-patient relationships.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/i-think-thats-very-screwed-up-openai-ceo-sam-altman-warns-about-chatgpt-privacy/articleshow/122931790.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/i-think-thats-very-screwed-up-openai-ceo-sam-altman-warns-about-chatgpt-privacy/articleshow/122931790.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 10:50:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="33866" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122931787,imgsize-33866.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Saiyaara’ BO collection: Mohit Suri’s film earns Rs 247.25 crore; Ahaan & Aneet shine</title><description><![CDATA[Mohit Suri's romantic drama 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, continues its successful run at the box office, earning Rs. 247.25 crore in India after 10 days. The film witnessed a significant jump in collections during its second weekend, reaching Rs. 44.5 crore in two days. 'Saiyaara' has become the second-highest-grossing Hindi film of 2025, surpassing 'Housefull 5'.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-10-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-soars-on-sunday-mohit-suris-film-earns-rs-247-25-crore-in-india/articleshow/122942283.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-10-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-soars-on-sunday-mohit-suris-film-earns-rs-247-25-crore-in-india/articleshow/122942283.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 05:53:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42144" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122942302,imgsize-42144.cms"/></item><item><title>Jadeja rewrites Test history, equals Sobers' 59-year-old record in England</title><description><![CDATA[Ravindra Jadeja has matched Sir Garfield Sobers' 1966 record, achieving five 50+ scores at No.6 or lower in a Test series in England. His unbeaten 107 in the fourth Test helped India secure a draw. Jadeja's consistent performance places him alongside Sobers in elite lists, with over 1000 runs and 30+ wickets in England.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-ravindra-jadeja-rewrites-test-history-equals-garry-sobers-59-year-old-iconic-record-in-england/articleshow/122942719.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-ravindra-jadeja-rewrites-test-history-equals-garry-sobers-59-year-old-iconic-record-in-england/articleshow/122942719.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 06:33:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83502" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122942726,imgsize-83502.cms"/></item><item><title>Drug lab in buffalo barn busted, Rs 50cr drugs, tools seized</title><description><![CDATA[A joint operation by Rajasthan and Maharashtra police, along with the Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB), dismantled a drug cartel operating from a buffalo barn in Barmer, Rajasthan. Authorities seized drugs and equipment worth Rs 50 crore, including Mephedrone and Ketamine, from the Barmer site and Raigad, Maharashtra. The investigation revealed a network of clandestine labs and led to multiple arrests, highlighting the NCB's efforts to combat synthetic drug manufacturing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/inter-state-drug-lab-in-buffalo-barn-busted-drugs-equipment-worth-rs-50-crore-seized/articleshow/122940188.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/inter-state-drug-lab-in-buffalo-barn-busted-drugs-equipment-worth-rs-50-crore-seized/articleshow/122940188.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:19:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJ SHEKHAR JHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1195080" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940196,imgsize-1195080.cms"/></item><item><title>Jeff Bezos sells $1.5 bn worth of Amazon shares, now holds stock valued at…</title><description><![CDATA[Jeff Bezos recently sold 6.6 million Amazon shares worth $1.5 billion, as per an SEC filing. The sales occurred on July 21 and 22, before Amazon's Q2 earnings report. These transactions were executed under a prearranged 10b5-1 trading plan. Bezos intends to sell more shares, potentially up to 25 million by May 2026. He has already sold $4.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/jeff-bezos-sells-1-5-billion-worth-of-amazon-shares-now-holds-stock-valued-at/articleshow/122904177.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/jeff-bezos-sells-1-5-billion-worth-of-amazon-shares-now-holds-stock-valued-at/articleshow/122904177.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 25 Jul 2025 16:34:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22154" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122904169,imgsize-22154.cms"/></item><item><title>Government identifies key sectors to attract foreign investors</title><description><![CDATA[Amid global economic uncertainty and fluctuating FDI inflows, the Indian government is actively targeting specific sectors like electronics, footwear, chemicals, medical devices, toys, and EVs to attract foreign investment. Efforts include leveraging production-linked incentive schemes and building resilient supply chains to reduce reliance on China.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/government-identifies-key-sectors-to-attract-foreign-investors/articleshow/122942692.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/government-identifies-key-sectors-to-attract-foreign-investors/articleshow/122942692.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 06:24:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1008719" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122942705,imgsize-1008719.cms"/></item><item><title>Bihar's draft poll roll may exclude 66 lakh names: EC</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission of India announced a potential exclusion of 6.6 million names from Bihar's draft electoral roll. These exclusions are due to electors registering in other states, being deceased, permanently shifting, or failing to submit required forms. The EC emphasized the "overwhelming participation" in the special intensive revision, with over 72 million forms submitted.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihars-draft-poll-roll-may-exclude-66-lakh-names-ec/articleshow/122940412.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bihars-draft-poll-roll-may-exclude-66-lakh-names-ec/articleshow/122940412.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 02:53:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>BHARTI JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1580386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940413,imgsize-1580386.cms"/></item><item><title>TCS to axe 12,000 jobs; IT giant’s biggest layoff ever</title><description><![CDATA[TCS, India's largest IT firm, will lay off 12,261 employees, about 2% of its workforce, due to AI disruptions and uncertain business demand. This significant restructuring aims to transform TCS into a future-ready organization. The job cuts primarily affect mid-level and senior executives, reflecting a strategic shift towards embracing AI and automation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tata-consultancy-services-to-axe-12000-jobs-it-firms-biggest-layoff-ever/articleshow/122939485.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tata-consultancy-services-to-axe-12000-jobs-it-firms-biggest-layoff-ever/articleshow/122939485.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 04:23:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>VEENA MANI AND REEBA ZACHARIAH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="590671" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122942748,imgsize-590671.cms"/></item><item><title>India's ambassador to Cuba ends up with 2 wives, SC seeks solution</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court addressed a complex matrimonial situation involving Indian Ambassador Thongkomang Armstrong Changsan, who remarried after a customary divorce deemed invalid by the Gauhati High Court. The court showed no sympathy for Changsan, whose first marriage, solemnized in a church, was improperly dissolved by village elders.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indias-ambassador-to-cuba-ends-up-with-2-wives-sc-seeks-solution/articleshow/122941591.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indias-ambassador-to-cuba-ends-up-with-2-wives-sc-seeks-solution/articleshow/122941591.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 04:54:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="75392" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941616,imgsize-75392.cms"/></item><item><title>Study reveals why men need to lower their standards on dating apps</title><description><![CDATA[A new study analyzes dating app behavior in Czech Republic. It reveals men pursue more desirable partners. Women seek similar desirability levels. Successful matches occur between equals. Men may need to lower standards for romance. Netizens debate the findings. Some question the study's relevance to Western cultures. Others share personal experiences. The debate continues on dating app standards. Read below!]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/love-sex/study-reveals-why-men-need-to-lower-their-standards-on-dating-apps/articleshow/122937246.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/relationships/love-sex/study-reveals-why-men-need-to-lower-their-standards-on-dating-apps/articleshow/122937246.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 20:54:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17336" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122937261,imgsize-17336.cms"/></item><item><title>New self-confidence in India post Sindoor: PM Modi before Parliament debate</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Modi, ahead of a crucial parliamentary debate on the Pahalgam terror attack and Operation Sindoor, asserted India's firm stance against terrorism. Speaking in Tamil Nadu, Modi emphasized that the precision strikes in Pakistan sent a clear message: terrorists have no safe havens. He highlighted the operation's role in fostering national self-confidence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/new-self-confidence-in-india-post-sindoor-pm-modi-before-parliament-debate/articleshow/122940645.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/new-self-confidence-in-india-post-sindoor-pm-modi-before-parliament-debate/articleshow/122940645.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:25:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="689291" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940652,imgsize-689291.cms"/></item><item><title>Ex-Maharashtra mantri kin, 6 others held in Pune drug party bust</title><description><![CDATA[Eknath Khadse's son-in-law, Pranjal Khewalkar, and six others were arrested in Pune during a raid on a Kharadi apartment. Police seized cocaine, marijuana, hookah pots, and liquor. Khewalkar, along with the others, faces charges under the NDPS Act and COTPA, with the court granting police custody until Tuesday as investigations continue into potential drug sources and networks.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ex-maharashtra-mantri-kin-6-others-held-in-pune-drug-party-bust/articleshow/122940085.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ex-maharashtra-mantri-kin-6-others-held-in-pune-drug-party-bust/articleshow/122940085.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:02:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ALIM SHAIKH AND GITESH SHELKE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="46544" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940090,imgsize-46544.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Bihar rape accused hired through private firm’: Health department</title><description><![CDATA[In Gaya, an ambulance driver and technician, employed through a private agency, are accused of raping a home guard job aspirant. The Wilson-Ciara dynamic blends football, fashion, and family. Fans eagerly anticipate Ciara's sideline outfits. The family's bond appears stronger than ever. Baby Amora resembles her dad.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/ciara-stuns-in-jean-shorts-and-giants-gear-effortlessly-outshining-russell-wilson-at-training-camp/articleshow/122937357.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/ciara-stuns-in-jean-shorts-and-giants-gear-effortlessly-outshining-russell-wilson-at-training-camp/articleshow/122937357.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 05:05:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="69588" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122937476,imgsize-69588.cms"/></item><item><title>8 dead, 28 injured in stampede at Haridwar’s Mansa Devi temple</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic stampede near Haridwar's Mansa Devi temple claimed eight lives and injured 28 others on Sunday morning. The incident, possibly triggered by rumors of electrocution, occurred on the pedestrian route with over 5,000 devotees present. Chief Minister Dhami announced compensation for the victims' families and ordered a probe.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/8-dead-28-injured-in-stampede-at-haridwars-mansa-devi-temple/articleshow/122937601.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/8-dead-28-injured-in-stampede-at-haridwars-mansa-devi-temple/articleshow/122937601.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 21:58:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MS NAWAZ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="78824" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122937782,imgsize-78824.cms"/></item><item><title>ED probes Anil’s RHFL for writing off Rs 7k cr loans to group firms</title><description><![CDATA[The Enforcement Directorate (ED) is investigating Anil Ambani's Reliance group for allegedly diverting ₹12,000 crore from Reliance Home Finance Ltd (RHFL) to related entities. Assisted by multiple agencies, the ED is scrutinizing transactions involving 22 individuals and 60 companies. A SEBI report highlights alleged fund laundering, with RHFL writing off ₹7,000 crore in loans to Anil Ambani linked entities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-probes-anils-rhfl-for-writing-off-rs-7k-cr-loans-to-group-firms/articleshow/122940575.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-probes-anils-rhfl-for-writing-off-rs-7k-cr-loans-to-group-firms/articleshow/122940575.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:16:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRADEEP THAKUR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="656304" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940614,imgsize-656304.cms"/></item><item><title>Interfaith marriages without religious conversion illegal: Alld HC</title><description><![CDATA[The Allahabad High Court declared interfaith marriages without religious conversion illegal and refused to dismiss criminal proceedings against a man accused of marrying a minor in an Arya Samaj temple. The court directed an investigation into Arya Samaj temples issuing marriage certificates without following regulations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/interfaith-marriages-without-religious-conversion-illegal-alld-hc/articleshow/122939242.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/interfaith-marriages-without-religious-conversion-illegal-alld-hc/articleshow/122939242.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 23:52:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJESH KUMAR PANDEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32976" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941267,imgsize-32976.cms"/></item><item><title>Rajkot: Daughter, 12, raped by father over 6 months</title><description><![CDATA[In Rajkot, a 12-year-old girl was allegedly molested and raped by her father over six months, according to police reports. The mother filed a complaint, leading to charges under the BNS Act and Pocso Act. The accused, a Nepalese security guard, fled after his wife discovered the abuse on July 25. Police are currently searching for him using various methods.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/rajkot/father-accused-of-repeated-rape-of-minor-daughter-in-rajkot/articleshow/122939434.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/rajkot/father-accused-of-repeated-rape-of-minor-daughter-in-rajkot/articleshow/122939434.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:04:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17260" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941180,imgsize-17260.cms"/></item><item><title>Adventure turns terror: 300 trekkers, including 100 women, rescued</title><description><![CDATA[Heavy rainfall caused the Kalu river to swell, stranding 300 trekkers, including 100 women, in the Malshej Ghat forest. A seven-hour rescue operation involving forest staffers and locals successfully brought the trekkers, mainly from Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Pune, to safety using ropes and ziplines.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/300-trekkers-rescued-from-forest-in-7hr-operation-at-malshej-ghat-as-kalu-river-rises/articleshow/122940110.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/300-trekkers-rescued-from-forest-in-7hr-operation-at-malshej-ghat-as-kalu-river-rises/articleshow/122940110.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:07:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANDIP DIGHE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2223621" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940394,imgsize-2223621.cms"/></item><item><title>Cops begin probe as Bihar deputy CM Samrat Choudhary gets death threat</title><description><![CDATA[Bihar's Deputy CM Samrat Choudhary received a death threat via an instant message, warning of a shooting within 24 hours. The message, sent to a party worker, prompted tightened security at Choudhary's residence and public events.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/cops-begin-probe-as-dy-cm-gets-death-threat/articleshow/122937078.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/cops-begin-probe-as-dy-cm-gets-death-threat/articleshow/122937078.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 20:28:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>FARYAL RUMI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="961740" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940399,imgsize-961740.cms"/></item><item><title>Trial court not the first stop for investigation, says Supreme Court</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has ruled that trial courts cannot directly entertain complaints seeking police investigation of cognisable offences. Before approaching a court, individuals must first seek FIR registration with the jurisdictional police. Magistrates should direct informants to approach the officer-in-charge and then the Superintendent of Police before considering applications under Section 156(3) of the CrPC.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/trial-court-not-the-first-stop-for-investigation-says-supreme-court/articleshow/122940341.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/trial-court-not-the-first-stop-for-investigation-says-supreme-court/articleshow/122940341.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:54:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="153620" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940343,imgsize-153620.cms"/></item><item><title>Varma row: Ignoring RS notice illegal, says Congress; 'petty mindset'</title><description><![CDATA[Congress has criticized BJP's decision to prioritize the Lok Sabha notice regarding Justice Yashwant Varma over the Rajya Sabha notice, alleging it stems from insecurity and a desire to control the narrative. Abhishek Singhvi accused the government of "illegality" and suggested former RS chairman Jagdeep Dhankhar's actions on the Varma issue led to his removal. Singhvi also alleged BJP MPs signed a blank paper, potentially an impeachment notice against Dhankhar.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ignoring-rajya-sabha-notice-illegal-says-congress/articleshow/122941330.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ignoring-rajya-sabha-notice-illegal-says-congress/articleshow/122941330.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 04:33:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="905370" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941387,imgsize-905370.cms"/></item><item><title>AI crash: Mum’s skin grafts help heal infant’s 36% burns</title><description><![CDATA[In a harrowing incident following the AI 171 airplane crash, eight-month-old Dhyaansh and his mother, Manisha, suffered severe burns. Manisha's courageous act of saving her child led to both enduring extensive treatment, including skin grafts for Dhyaansh. The dedicated medical team at KD Hospital provided specialized care, ensuring their recovery and eventual discharge, highlighting the strength of a mother's love and medical expertise.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/ai-crash-mums-skin-grafts-help-heal-infants-36-burns/articleshow/122939791.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/ai-crash-mums-skin-grafts-help-heal-infants-36-burns/articleshow/122939791.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:28:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PARTH SHASTRI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="953671" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940321,imgsize-953671.cms"/></item><item><title>Only Dhankhar, PM Modi know real reason behind VP’s exit: Kharge</title><description><![CDATA[Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge stated he lacks information regarding Jagdeep Dhankhar's resignation as Vice President, suggesting it's a matter between Dhankhar and Prime Minister Modi. Kharge noted Dhankhar's consistent support for the government and his reluctance to allow discussions on farmer issues, poverty, and social injustices in the Rajya Sabha. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/only-dhankhar-pm-modi-know-real-reason-behind-vps-exit-mallikarjun-kharge/articleshow/122940216.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/only-dhankhar-pm-modi-know-real-reason-behind-vps-exit-mallikarjun-kharge/articleshow/122940216.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:26:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1188200" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940249,imgsize-1188200.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Hero bystanders stops Walmart stabber; Derrick Perry holds attacker at gunpoint</title><description><![CDATA[A stabbing attack at a Traverse City Walmart injured 11 people before bystanders intervened. Derrick Perry, identified by family and locals, is being hailed as a hero for drawing his licensed weapon and holding the suspect, Bradford James Gille, at gunpoint. Perry, along with a former Marine who used a shopping cart, stopped Gille until police arrived, preventing further harm.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/hero-bystanders-stopped-walmart-stabber-ex-marine-derrick-perry-held-attacker-at-gunpoint-praised-online/articleshow/122940271.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/hero-bystanders-stopped-walmart-stabber-ex-marine-derrick-perry-held-attacker-at-gunpoint-praised-online/articleshow/122940271.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:52:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34698" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940319,imgsize-34698.cms"/></item><item><title>EC must stop SIR, says opposition; calls it ‘exercise of exclusion’</title><description><![CDATA[Opposition parties in India are raising concerns about the Election Commission's special intensive revision of Bihar's electoral rolls, alleging it could disenfranchise marginalized communities. They question the potential exclusion of 66 lakh people and criticize the rejection of certain documents. The Election Commission defends the process, urging parties to submit claims and objections during the designated period.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ec-must-stop-sir-says-opposition-calls-it-exercise-of-exclusion/articleshow/122940426.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ec-must-stop-sir-says-opposition-calls-it-exercise-of-exclusion/articleshow/122940426.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:00:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMBIKA PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1325496" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940430,imgsize-1325496.cms"/></item><item><title>McCarthy addresses edited video scare: False alarm during Vikings camp</title><description><![CDATA[A misleading video circulating online falsely depicts J.J. McCarthy throwing five interceptions at a Minnesota Vikings practice. The clip is actually a compilation of older footage, unrelated to the team's 2025 training camp. Coaches affirm McCarthy's progress and readiness as the starting quarterback, emphasizing his growth in film study and situational awareness.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/j-j-mccarthy-responds-as-old-edited-video-sparks-false-panic-during-vikings-training-camp/articleshow/122937995.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/j-j-mccarthy-responds-as-old-edited-video-sparks-false-panic-during-vikings-training-camp/articleshow/122937995.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 22:24:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30898" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122937998,imgsize-30898.cms"/></item><item><title>Raj visits Matoshree after years on Uddhav b’day, calls him Sena chief</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst speculation of a Shiv Sena (UBT) and MNS alliance for upcoming civic polls, Raj Thackeray visited Uddhav Thackeray at Matoshree on his birthday, marking a rare reunion. The cousins spoke for 20 minutes, with Raj paying tribute to Bal Thackeray. This visit, following Uddhav's hints of a reunion, fuels speculation of a political alliance, though some downplay its significance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mns-chief-raj-thackeray-visits-matoshree-after-years-on-cousin-uddhav-thackerays-birthday-calls-him-shiv-sena-chief/articleshow/122940360.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/mns-chief-raj-thackeray-visits-matoshree-after-years-on-cousin-uddhav-thackerays-birthday-calls-him-shiv-sena-chief/articleshow/122940360.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 02:06:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ABHISHEK CHOUDHARI AND CHAITANYA MARPAKWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="961810" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940362,imgsize-961810.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi HC rejects bail of suspected Isis member in arms case</title><description><![CDATA[The Delhi High Court has denied bail to Mohd Rizwan Ashraf, a suspected ISIS member accused of procuring arms and ammunition and using social media to promote the organization's goals. The court upheld the trial court's detention order, emphasizing that it was not a routine decision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhi-hc-rejects-bail-of-suspected-isis-member-in-arms-case/articleshow/122940060.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhi-hc-rejects-bail-of-suspected-isis-member-in-arms-case/articleshow/122940060.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:55:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1179496" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940078,imgsize-1179496.cms"/></item><item><title>CRPF personnel made a mark by their duty, courage, says PM on Raising Day</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi lauded the CRPF's crucial role in national security, particularly in internal security challenges, on the force's 87th Raising Day. Home Minister Amit Shah commended the CRPF's selfless sacrifice and courage in combating Naxalism. Home Secretary Govind Mohan assured the CRPF of the Home Ministry's commitment to providing modern weapons and technology to address increasing security threats.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/crpf-personnel-made-a-mark-by-their-duty-courage-says-pm-on-raising-day/articleshow/122939950.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/crpf-personnel-made-a-mark-by-their-duty-courage-says-pm-on-raising-day/articleshow/122939950.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:42:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="52482" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122939977,imgsize-52482.cms"/></item><item><title>Aaron Rodgers responds to Terry Bradshaw barbs: Sharp Steelers jibe addressed</title><description><![CDATA[Aaron Rodgers has addressed Terry Bradshaw's criticism of the Steelers signing him. Bradshaw had called the move a "joke," but Rodgers responded respectfully, acknowledging Bradshaw's legendary status and expressing a desire to get to know him better. Rodgers emphasized his respect for NFL legends and took the high road in his response.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/aaron-rodgers-finally-answers-terry-bradshaws-harsh-steelers-comment/articleshow/122937032.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/aaron-rodgers-finally-answers-terry-bradshaws-harsh-steelers-comment/articleshow/122937032.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 27 Jul 2025 20:40:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1079029" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122937014,imgsize-1079029.cms"/></item><item><title>India growing by leaps and bounds in space sector: PM Modi</title><description><![CDATA[PM Modi lauded India's growing space capabilities, highlighting Group Captain Shukla's ISS journey and the surge in space startups to over 200. He noted the Chandrayaan-3 mission sparked curiosity among children, boosting participation in science innovation programs. Modi also encouraged ideas for celebrating the upcoming National Space Day on August 23.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-growing-by-leaps-and-bounds-in-space-sector-pm-modi/articleshow/122940889.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-growing-by-leaps-and-bounds-in-space-sector-pm-modi/articleshow/122940889.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:56:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="688125" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940950,imgsize-688125.cms"/></item><item><title>Tharoor unlikely to speak on debate on Pahalgam attack, Op Sindoor issues in LS</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor is unlikely to participate in the Lok Sabha debate on the Pahalgam terror attack and Operation Sindoor. Sources indicate that neither Tharoor nor the Congress party has expressed interest in his involvement. While Rahul Gandhi is a potential initiator, he might delegate to Gaurav Gogoi, as seen previously.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/tharoor-unlikely-to-speak-on-debate-on-pahalgam-attack-op-sindoor-issues-in-ls/articleshow/122940661.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/tharoor-unlikely-to-speak-on-debate-on-pahalgam-attack-op-sindoor-issues-in-ls/articleshow/122940661.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:32:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1203856" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940694,imgsize-1203856.cms"/></item><item><title>Opposition to Punjab's land-pooling policy brings together farmers</title><description><![CDATA[In Punjab, resistance to the AAP government's land-pooling policy is uniting fragmented farm organizations and individual farmers, reigniting farm struggles. Despite government assurances, farmers fear losing land under the scheme, which aims to pool over 40,000 acres for urban development, offering developed plots in exchange.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/opposition-to-punjabs-land-pooling-policy-brings-together-farmers/articleshow/122940432.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/opposition-to-punjabs-land-pooling-policy-brings-together-farmers/articleshow/122940432.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:05:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NEEL KAMAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1254719" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940440,imgsize-1254719.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi hails Chola legacy, unveils statue plan in TN</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi lauded the Chola dynasty's historical and cultural significance, announcing plans to erect statues of Raja Raja Chola and Rajendra Chola in Tamil Nadu. PM Modi commemorated Rajendra Chola I's birth anniversary at the Brihadisvara temple, highlighting the Cholas' contributions to Shaivism, temple architecture, and strategic advancements.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-modi-hails-chola-legacy-unveils-statue-plan-in-tn/articleshow/122940917.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-modi-hails-chola-legacy-unveils-statue-plan-in-tn/articleshow/122940917.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 03:59:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DEEPAK KARTHIK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1362152" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941001,imgsize-1362152.cms"/></item><item><title>Arms seized from ISI-backed gang in Punjab</title><description><![CDATA[Amritsar Police successfully busted a Pakistan's ISI-backed smuggling network, arresting five individuals and seizing a significant cache of arms, ammunition, and drug money. The operation intercepted an AK Saiga rifle, Glock pistols, ammunition, and Rs 7.5 lakh intended for Nav Pandori, an associate of gangster Jaggu Bhagwanpuria. Preliminary investigations revealed direct links between the arrested individuals and Pakistan-based operatives.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/arms-seized-from-isi-backed-gang-in-punjab/articleshow/122940366.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/arms-seized-from-isi-backed-gang-in-punjab/articleshow/122940366.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 02:12:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="824920" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940367,imgsize-824920.cms"/></item><item><title>Three patients on ventilators die amid fault in Jalandhar civil hospital oxygen plant</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic oxygen plant malfunction at Jalandhar's Civil Hospital led to the deaths of three patients on ventilators. The fatalities occurred within a 35-minute span, prompting a high-level inquiry. While the medical superintendent acknowledged the fault and cited backup systems, a nine-member committee will investigate potential negligence. The victims included a teenager, a recovering addict, and a tuberculosis patient.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/3-patients-on-ventilators-die-amid-fault-in-jalandhar-civil-hospital-oxygen-plantip-singh/articleshow/122940159.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/3-patients-on-ventilators-die-amid-fault-in-jalandhar-civil-hospital-oxygen-plantip-singh/articleshow/122940159.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 01:16:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>IP SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="509471" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122941114,imgsize-509471.cms"/></item><item><title>Not just bricks & stones: PM Modi lauds defiance legacy of Bundelkhand forts</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/not-just-bricks-stones-pm-modi-lauds-defiance-legacy-of-bundelkhand-forts/articleshow/122940075.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/not-just-bricks-stones-pm-modi-lauds-defiance-legacy-of-bundelkhand-forts/articleshow/122940075.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 00:58:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="965722" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940871,imgsize-965722.cms"/></item><item><title>Newborn loses 5 fingers in operation sans parents’ consent</title><description><![CDATA[A Chennai hospital and gynaecologist have been held liable for negligence after a premature baby lost all five fingers on his right hand to gangrene. The district consumer disputes redressal commission found that a cervical pessary procedure, performed without informed consent or adequate justification, triggered a chain of events leading to the baby's premature birth and subsequent complications.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/newborn-loses-5-fingers-in-operation-sans-parents-consent/articleshow/122940372.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/newborn-loses-5-fingers-in-operation-sans-parents-consent/articleshow/122940372.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 28 Jul 2025 02:16:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAM SUNDARAM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="552129" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-122940388,imgsize-552129.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[KFin Technologies is holding firm on its FY26 revenue growth guidance of 18–20% despite a weak Q1, with CEO Sreekanth Nadella pointing to seasonal trends and upcoming integration of Ascent Fund Services as key tailwinds. “Q2, Q3, and Q4 are typically much stronger,” he said, adding that yield compression in mutual funds is a strategic trade-off to support client growth.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/aurm-private-vault-company-hyperlocal-secure-storage-india-expansion-19640794.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[In an interview with CNBC-TV18, Vijay Kumar Arisetty, Founder & CEO of Aurm, unveiled ambitious plans for his private vault company, aiming for 40,000 lockers across 150 sites by March 2026. Arisetty detailed Aurm's innovative approach, which includes 24/7 access, military-grade security, and a unique hyperlocal model within gated communities, all backed by significant insurance coverage. Beyond secure storage, Aurm is set to expand into financial products, leveraging its strong customer trust and a business model already proving profitable.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[IREDA will remain exclusively focused on the renewable energy sector, with no plans to diversify, CMD Pradip Kumar Das told CNBC-TV18.
